00020 
00021 // The constructor
00022 SubspaceMap::SubspaceMap(QDomNode &memoryMapNode): MemoryMapItem(memoryMapNode),
00023 parameters_() {
00024         for (int i = 0; i < memoryMapNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00025                 if (memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i).nodeName() ==
00026                                 QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00027 
00028                         // go through all parameters
00029                         for (int j = 0;
00030                                         j < memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i).childNodes().count();
00031                                         ++j) {
00032 
00033                                 QDomNode parameterNode =
00034                                                 memoryMapNode.childNodes().at(i).childNodes().at(j);
00035                                 Parameter *temp = new Parameter(parameterNode);
00036                                 parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(temp));
00037                         }
00038                 }
00039         }
00040 
00041         // if mandatory elements are missing
00042         if (!MemoryMapItem::attributes_.contains(QString("spirit:masterRef"))) {
00043                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory attribute spirit:masterRef"
00044                                 " missing in spirit:subspaceMap"));
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 SubspaceMap::SubspaceMap( const SubspaceMap &other ):
00049 MemoryMapItem(other),
00050 parameters_() {
00051 
00052         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00053                 if (param) {
00054                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00055                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00056                         parameters_.append(copy);
00057                 }
00058         }
00059 }
00060 
00061 SubspaceMap & SubspaceMap::operator=( const SubspaceMap &other ) {
00062         if (this != &other) {
00063                 MemoryMapItem::operator=(other);
00064 
00065                 parameters_.clear();
00066                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00067                         if (param) {
00068                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00069                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00070                                 parameters_.append(copy);
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073         }
00074         return *this;
00075 }
00076 
00077 // The destructor
00078 SubspaceMap::~SubspaceMap() {
00079         parameters_.clear();
00080 }
00081 
00082 void SubspaceMap::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00083         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:subspaceMap");
00084         // write the base class information
00085         MemoryMapItem::write(writer);
00086 
00087         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00088                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00089 
00090                 // each parameter
00091                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00092                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00093                 }
00094 
00095                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00096         }
00097 
00098         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:subspaceMap
00099 }
00100 
00101 const QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> >& SubspaceMap::getParameters() {
00102         return parameters_;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void SubspaceMap::setParameters(const
00106                 QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> > &parameters) {
00107         // first delete old parameters
00108         parameters_.clear();
00109 
00110         // save the new parameters
00111         parameters_ = parameters;
00112 }
